pages.text: $(li)Elytra are rare wings found in End Ships in the $(l:patchouli:structures/end_city)End City$(/l) over the End.$(br)$(li)They can be equipped in your Chestplate slot and they can be used to fly.$(br)$(li)You can usem use them to craft a better version known as the Tarantula Hawk Elytra.

pages.name: Elytra
pages.text: To fly, you must press the jump key while falling, and the elytra spread apart like a beetle's elytra.
